product_name: Demon Flex Force X D30 Protective Shorts - Women's
long_description: The Demon Flex Force X D3O protective shorts keep the hard impacts to a minimum without letting anyone notice you're wearing protective gear. Slender feminine cut is designed to be worn beneath traditional outerwear to help protect you from falls on hardpack and ice. Constructed from perforated Lycra(R) nylon/spandex fabric for breathability and a touch of insulation. Breathable padding in key areas is ergonomically shaped and reduces impact from falls on hips, thighs and tailbone. Internal foam pad enhances comfort when sitting on high-density tailbone protection. Low-profile design doesn't hinder movement or feel bulky; drawcord waistband stays in place.
short_description: The Demon Flex Force X D3O protective shorts keep the hard impacts to a minimum without letting anyone notice you're wearing protective gear.
